label: Active_gNBs
model_reason: The DU configuration needs to declare itself as the active gNB to correctly initialize and connect to the CU. This ensures the DU registers as a valid endpoint in the network.
reference_reason: No relevant information found in reference_context.

label: gNB_name
model_reason: Setting the gNB_name in the DU configuration is essential for identification and proper communication with the CU. This name must match the configuration within the CU's Active_gNBs list if multiple DUs are being managed.
reference_reason: No relevant information found in reference_context.
